alert.note: Alert for Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 3:26PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Plymouth and central Bristol Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 326 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Marshfield to near Plympton to near Lakeville. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Taunton, Marshfield, Middleborough, Somerset, Scituate, Pembroke, Swansea, Duxbury, Kingston, Carver, Lakeville, Norwell, Hanson, Freetown, Halifax, Dighton, Berkley, Rochester, and Plympton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. These storms may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
